description:
The GameFly App is the ultimate video games application. The GameFly App gives you access to over 7,000 video games across all current consoles and handhelds, putting the most popular games, new releases and 'coming soon' titles right at your fingertips. Get all the information you need, including up-to-the minute news, release dates, user reviews, critic reviews, gameplay controls, cheats and codes, and a whole lot more. 

Features: 
- Access to the largest videogame information resource in the App Catalog.
- More than 7,000 video game titles across all major platforms, including PlayStation 3, PlayStation 2, Xbox 360, Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo DS, Nintendo Wii, PSP, Xbox, Game Boy Advance, and GameCube.
- Watch the latest game trailers for the hottest titles.
- Check out thousands of video game images and screenshots. 
- Featured video games from EA, Activision, Ubisoft, THQ and other popular publishers. 
- Game description, release date, platform availability, user reviews, critic reviews from IGN, cheat codes, gameplay controls, game specs, ESRB ratings, game videos, and screenshots. 
- Breaking game news and previews and reviews for console, handheld and PC games from sites like Shacknews.com. 
- GameFly members can sign into their GameFly account and manage their GameQ. GameCenter is brought to you by GameFly, the #1 online video game rental service. 

Try it now, it’s FREE!
